ComicInfo.Summary:
A word from Dr. Droog to the reader.
Red Tempest XXX saves Jacko from the Cave Doogs and other creatures residing in the cave. Later she shows him how she got her new powers.
Filliter is fellated by a Kekeppy which is then impaled by his member.
Fritz Baby watches Pupusi fellate Max via a screen.
The Snowman has an sexually explicit dream featuring Winged Kekeppys and the Nimmy.
The Mentor is mad at the Orlat.
An obese man and his mom go into the Tower of the Sindog, where all dreams may come true.
The Biddies try to make pancakes with X-25's jizz.
